input_text.Prompt:
Generate a product description using the following product title and specifications.

Product title:
Officially LIcensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey - X-Large

Product specifications:
-Officially Licensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey
-Constructed of Breathable Micro-Mesh Polyester
-Features Official Team Number Font and Embroidered Logo on Sleeve
-Stylish V-Neck Cut Allows for a Comfortable Fit
-Decorated in the USA
input_text.Response A: This officially licensed Dallas Cowboys dog jersey is made of breathable micro-mesh polyester and features the official team number font and embroidered logo on the sleeve. The V-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit and it is decorated in the USA. Your pet will be ready for game day with this stylish jersey on!
input_text.Response B: It's time to let your furry fan show their team spirt with this officially licensed Dallas Cowboys dog jersey. This stylish and comfortable jersey is constructed of breathable micro-mesh polyester and is decorated right here in the USA. It features the official team number font and embroidered logo on the sleeve. The stylish v-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: This response does exactly what the prompt says but it's not too different from the prompt and doesn't add too much to the description apart from the very last part it doesn't add anything interesting to the product description
label_annotations.factors_b: This response gets all the information from the prompt correct and was able to generate a response that seems like it would fit a product description on a shop website extremely well, it lists everything in a way that seems like a human has generated the description and makes the product more desirable with the way it describes it
